vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀκρο-γωνιαῖος, α, ον,
at the extreme angle, ἀ. λίθος corner foundation-stone, [LXX+NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: cornerstone, an essential stone in the construction of a building
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
cornerstone, an essential stone in the construction of a building
literally: lying at the extreme corner; with λιθος, corner or foundation stone, Eph. 2:20; 1Pet. 2:6*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: (置於最角落) 房角石, 拱頂石 (弗 2:20; 彼前 2:6)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: (置于最角落) 房角石, 拱顶石 (弗 2:20; 彼前 2:6)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: đá góc nhà ; đá tảng góc tường // Tt 118:22-29 ; Ê-sai 28 :16 LXX
